citations.narrative:
The facility is not vaccinating dogs for rabies. The Program of Veterinary Care on file states under the Vaccination
Schedule for Rabies "N/A-closed colony". The facility consists of indoor outdoor runs such that dogs can have face to face
access through fencing with each other or with wild animals that might approach the outdoor runs.
Failure to vaccinate for rabies can result in dogs being exposed to a serious disease risk.
The Program of Veterinary Care must include vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs including
rabies.
Correct by: Update the Program of Veterinary Care to include a rabies vaccination schedule and begin vaccinations by
September 28, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is not vaccinating dogs for rabies. The Program of Veterinary Care on file states under the Vaccination 
Schedule for Rabies "N/A-closed colony". The facility consists of indoor outdoor runs such that dogs can have face to face 
access through fencing with each other or with wild animals that might approach the outdoor runs. 
Failure to vaccinate for rabies can result in dogs being exposed to a serious disease risk. 
The Program of Veterinary Care must include vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs including 
rabies. 
Correct by: Update the Program of Veterinary Care to include a rabies vaccination schedule and begin vaccinations by 
September 28, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant. 
 
 n
